statements: SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM Customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email NOT LIKE '%@yahoo.com';
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_contact FROM Customers WHERE customer_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_contact FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 5 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_contact IS NOT NULL AND customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_address DESC;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, LEFT(customer_name, 3) AS initials FROM Customers GROUP BY initials HAVING total_customers > 2 ORDER BY total_customers DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customers;

SELECT customer_name, customer_address, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%-1234%';

SELECT name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, name, address, contact_number FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 3 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, address, contact_number FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name ASC, customer_id;
SELECT name AS customer_name, contact_number AS phone_number FROM Customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' GROUP BY phone_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, city, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE state='California';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, address, city, state FROM Customers JOIN Addresses ON Customers.customer_id = Addresses.customer_id WHERE state = 'California'
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_name, contact_type, contact_value FROM Customers JOIN Contacts ON Customers.customer_id = Contacts.customer_id WHERE contact_type = 'Email'
